Hello all.

Since we're going to restart, we need someone to RP the leader of 
the Maximals, and we need someone to RP Megatron of the Predacons. 
If you want to do it, then email me. If I don't get any emails, I'm 
going to force someone to do it. =P (a necessary evil)

I have volunteered myself to RP Megatron, so I'm really only 
awaiting a volunteer to RP the leader of the Maximals. (not 
necessarily Optimus Primal, etc. Past leaders can also be chosen if 
you so wish)

The next thing is that I need to know how many bots are going to be 
joining each side. I'd like the Predacons and the Maximals to have 
even or close to even numbers of bots at the start. I would like 
everyone to email me with what bots they are bringing in at the 
start, Predacons or Maximals or both. That way I can determine 
whether I need to create some balance, or leave it as it stands.

I'll update my list with each email that I receive. The quicker you 
reply, the quicker the RPG will restart. I would like to put 
emphasis on people replying with private emails (x_rauq_x@...) 
but I'm not going to penalize anyone who makes the mistake of 
replying to this post.

Some people may be required to RP a predacon or a Maximal if there 
is the need. If you are one of those people, the character can be 
either temporary, or you can keep the char if you like.
